name: Bwired Studios
tag_list: drupal, joomla, wordpress, web-design, web-development, kitchener, waterloo, cambridge
overview:
Bwired Studios develops Websites, Intranets and corporate applications using Joomla, Drupal and WordPress CMS, in Kitchener, Waterloo and Cambridge areas.

Our experienced team of web developers have fine-tuned the implementation process to ensure quick turn-around, smooth deployment and reliable results.

This is why we continually improve on our Web design and development life cycle, evolving with technological advances and enhancing our own systems to ensure prompt and efficient delivery.

A Content Management System (CMS) is one of the best and most cost-effective solutions to enhance your web presence. Bwired Studios designs, develops Custom and Open Source Content Management Systems and Websites that allow you to easily create and update content on your website including: text, images, videos, multimedia, documents forms and links to name a few. All without needing programming or technical skills.

Contact our local office for any Web Design requests within Kitchener, Waterloo and Cambridge.
